description: This is a delicious way of introducing blueberries into your families meals.
name: Fluffy Blueberry Pancakes Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Make the pancake batter as for Classic American buttermilk pancakes.

Heat a knob of butter in the frying pan and pour out 8-10cm pancakes. Once you have poured them into the pan, sprinkle some of the blueberries on top; the batter will rise up around the berries as they cook.

Fry the pancakes for 2 minutes on each side, turning when the edges are set and bubbles appear and pop on the surface. When cooked, keep them warm on a plate under a clean tea towel while you fry the rest. Serve with butter and maple syrup.
